title: sanitizers build failure with glibc 2.26

labels.name: C-enhancement
labels.description: Category: An issue proposing an enhancement or a PR with one.

body:
With glibc 2.26 installed, rustc compilation fails with errors such as

```
/var/tmp/paludis/build/dev-lang-rust-scm/work/rust-scm/src/libcompiler_builtins/compiler-rt/lib/sanitizer_common/sanitizer_stoptheworld_linux_libcdep.cc: In function 'int __sanitizer::TracerThread(void*)':        
/var/tmp/paludis/build/dev-lang-rust-scm/work/rust-scm/src/libcompiler_builtins/compiler-rt/lib/sanitizer_common/sanitizer_stoptheworld_linux_libcdep.cc:278:22: error: aggregate 'sigaltstack handler_stack' has incomplete type and cannot be defined                                                                                                                                                                                   
   struct sigaltstack handler_stack;                                                                      
                      ^~~~~~~~~~~~~                                                                       
make[3]: *** [lib/sanitizer_common/CMakeFiles/RTSanitizerCommonLibc.x86_64.dir/build.make:255: lib/sanitizer_common/CMakeFiles/RTSanitizerCommonLibc.x86_64.dir/sanitizer_stoptheworld_linux_libcdep.cc.o] Error 1   
```

I guess updating the compiler-rt module in compiler-builtins should be enough to fix this
